entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 6:34AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LIGHT SNOW WILL MAKE ROADS AND SIDEWALKS SLICK... An upper level disturbance will bring light snow to far Northern Wisconsin today. Accumulations will be light, ranging from a half inch from Rhinelander to Niagara, to as much as an inch and a half from Manitowish Waters to Land O Lakes. Roads and sidewalks will be snow covered, so travel with care.
